flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Build up this new micro timer kit, the programmed chip is set up for 10mins relay switches off.

A full kit is are available from James Electronics. email us at eyecatchu@yahoo.com.au for price.

!!! Special offer limted time only.

FREE SHIPPING''italic text''
